    Ravi Ranjan Pandey
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<cmath>
#include<stack>
#include<utility>
#define MAX(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define MIN(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define SWAP(a,b) {int tmp=a;a=b;b=tmp;}
long long int a[10001];
using namespace std;
inline long long inp()
    {
    long long noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
    while(p>32)
    {
    noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
    p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
    };
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,i,sum,avg,sum1;
    t=inp();;
    while(t--)
    {
              sum=0;
              n=inp();
              for(i=0;i<n;i++)
             a[i]=inp();
              for(i=0;i<n;i++)
              {
                 sum=sum+a[i]; 
                 }            
              avg=sum/n;
              sum1=0;
              for(i=0;i<n;i++)
              {
                              sum1=sum1+a[i];
                              avg=MIN(avg,sum1/(i+1));
                              }
                              cout<<avg<<endl;
                              }
                              return 0;
                              }
